long_description: With its lean and clean look, the women's Deuter Futura 20 SL Pack is perfect for day hikes, hut-to-hut mountain excursions and light scrambles. Contoured, padded, women-specific shoulder straps and hipbelt are covered with wide 3D air-mesh for a snug yet well-ventilated fit. AIRCOMFORT ventilated back system helps reduce perspiration by up to 25%. Hydration compatible (reservoir sold separately). The Deuter Futura 20 SL Packs sports a front pocket, stretch side pockets, hipbelt pocket, laundry compartment and compression straps. Includes trekking-pole loops, light loop and a detachable rain cover.
short_description: With its lean and clean look, the women's Deuter Futura 20 SL Pack is perfect for day hikes, hut-to-hut mountain excursions and light scrambles.
